amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing funding for the inland waterways system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator Toomey.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator Toomey.
